description.author: David Fox <dsf@seereason.com>, Jeremy Shaw <jeremy@seereason.com>, Clifford Beshers <beshers@seereason.com>
description.synopsis: Modules for working with the Debian package system
description.description:
This library includes modules covering some basic data types defined by
the Debian policy manual - version numbers, control file syntax, etc.

package-flags.name: network-uri
package-flags.description: Get Network.URI from the network-uri package
